TopicTitle: Text on main menu screen looks like a barcode

Articles.Content:
Version: Stock KSP v1.12.5, Breaking Ground 1.7.1, Making History 1.12.1

System: Windows 11 Home version 23H2 64-bit, Intel i5 12400F processor, AMD 6650 XT graphics card

Booted up the game yesterday and the menu screen looked text looked all messed up. A friend joked it looked like a barcode. Booted it today and it displays the same behavior. All options are usable like normal, and the Settings screen looks fine - no issues I can see there. Ditto for starting a new save; everything in-game looks fine too. It's just the menu screen looking like I'm checking out at the store.

 

Image in spoiler.
